articles.title: K'taka: Now, II PU exams from Apr 22; draft timetable out
articles.description: II PU exams have been postponed following a clash with Joint Entrance Examination (JEE) Main dates. As per the new draft timetable, the II PU exams are proposed to begin on April 22.
